name: Darkest Castle
description:
Best played in Chrome...

...or download the desktop builds below.

Under the cover of darkness, you must build the tallest tower to uncover the evil hidden forces that threaten your lands. (See what I did there?)

Built over a weekend for the Glitch Jam 1 with the theme of  Hidden Forces. Art and Programming by Michael Wilson, Music by Alexander Ehlers, Sound Effects from the free RPG Sound Pack by artisticdude..

Special Thanks to Graham Ranson, Corona Labs, Ponywolf, Jennifer, Eden, Audrey, Penelope, Trouble and Cupcake.
